alert.note: Alert for Chaves; De Baca; Guadalupe; Lincoln (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 4:25PM MDT until May 31 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lincoln County in central New Mexico... Southwestern De Baca County in east central New Mexico... Northwestern Chaves County in southeastern New Mexico... Southern Guadalupe County in east central New Mexico... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 425 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ramon, or 36 miles southeast of Vaughn, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ramon. This includes the following highways... Highway 285 between Mile Markers 155 and 183. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 292 and 298. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
